paramInformation.label: LED Indication
paramInformation.description: Specify if LED should indicate special event.

metadata.inclusion:
1. Place a magnet at the rounded edge
2. When the LED blinks, move the magnet away
3. Repeat a total of 3 times within 10 seconds
4. A long LED blink indicates successful inclusion
metadata.exclusion:
1. Place a magnet at the rounded edge
2. When the LED blinks, move the magnet away
3. Repeat a total of 3 times within 10 seconds
4. A long LED blink indicates successful exclusion
metadata.wakeup:
1. Place a magnet at the rounded edge
2. When the LED blinks, move the magnet away
3. Repeat a total of 3 times within 10 seconds
4. A LED blink indicates success
metadata.reset:
1. Place a magnet at the rounded edge
2. When the LED blinks, move the magnet away
3. Repeat a total of 3 times within 10 seconds, but on the 3rd repetition, leave the magnet at the rounded edge for 10 seconds
4. A long LED signal indicates success
